article.title: U.S. Air Force Modifies Space-Based Infrared System Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Sunnyvale, California, was awarded a nearly $8 million contract modification, which will incorporate the dual operations capability into the existing engineering, manufacturing and development contract for the space-based infrared system high component. U.S. Air Force Space and Missile Systems Center, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
